chapters.title: Understanding Digital Investment
chapters.summary: This chapter introduces the concept of digital investment, explaining its importance and how it differs from traditional investment methods.

chapters.title: Women in Digital Investment
chapters.summary: This chapter explores the role of women in digital investment, highlighting their contributions and the challenges they face.

chapters.title: Financial Literacy for Digital Investors
chapters.summary: This chapter focuses on the importance of financial literacy for those engaging in digital investment and provides key concepts and skills needed.

chapters.title: Empowering Women through Financial Literacy in Digital Investment
chapters.summary: This chapter discusses how financial literacy can empower women to participate more effectively in digital investment, along with strategies and resources for enhancing their knowledge.
